content: उत्क्षेपणं {@--1@} Throwing upwards, lifting or tossing up; अतिमात्रलोहिततलौ बाहू घटोत्क्षेपणात् <ls>Ś. 1. 30.</ls> {@--2@} Throwing upwards, regarded by the Vaiśeṣikas as one of the five {%karmans%} <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--3@} Vomiting. {@--4@} Sending away, despatching. {@--5@} A kind of basket for cleaning corn; a kind of stick for threshing corn. {@--6@} A fan. {@--7@} A measure of sixteen Paṇas.
